meanings.definition: A live performance by a musician or group
meanings.sent1: The band had a series of gigs at local bars.
meanings.sent2: Attending gigs is a fun way to enjoy live music.
meanings.sent3: The gig last night had everyone dancing and singing along.
meanings.sent4: Her gig at the concert was like a burst of energy on stage.
meanings.sent5: The gig was so memorable that fans talked about it for weeks.

meanings.sent1: She picked up a few gigs to earn extra money.
meanings.sent2: Freelancers often rely on gigs for their income.
meanings.sent3: His gig as a dog walker was both fun and rewarding.
meanings.sent4: Finding a gig as a tutor helped her save up for a trip.
meanings.sent5: The gig at the fair was a quick way to make some cash.

meanings.definition: A fishing spear with a single or multiple barbed prongs
meanings.sent1: The fisherman used a gigs to catch his dinner.
meanings.sent2: The gigs was essential for fishing in the shallow waters.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally dropped the gigs into the lake while fishing.
meanings.sent4: The gigs gleamed in the sunlight as he prepared to fish.
meanings.sent5: Using the gigs required precision and skill to catch fish.

meanings.definition: A light two-wheeled carriage pulled by one horse
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a gigs to transport goods around the farm.
meanings.sent2: The gigs rattled along the dirt road with ease.
meanings.sent3: The gigs was a charming way to travel through the countryside.
meanings.sent4: She enjoyed the peaceful ride in the gigs through the fields.
meanings.sent5: The gigs added a touch of nostalgia to the rural landscape.
